comprehensive_overview: The r-curl package is an R interface to the libcurl library, a highly customizable and feature-rich library for transferring data with various types of protocols. This package allows users to easily access and interact with URLs using a wide range of protocols.
core_features: Allows sending and receiving data over HTTP, FTP, IMAP, POP3, etc.
Supports HTTPS and SSH secure connections
Provides functionalities for handling cookies and user authentication
Offers flexibility for customizing requests and responses
